name: Balancing Act (SimanGuyman)
description:
Sometimes, even the simplest tasks feel like walking a thin tightrope.

Experience the life of this poor sod performing menial office labour and tedious mental math while keeping from going completely insane! You'll have to push your multitasking skills to the absolute limit to keep your boss happy.

This is a submission for the Fall 2022 GDDC game jam that was made in just 48 hours! The theme was 'The Fall'.
